(1,): As a system administrator, I want to upload and validate files, so that I can ensure data accuracy and integrity As a USASpending administrator, I want to update data from FABS and FPDS, so that I can provide accurate and up-to-date information As a broker, I want to validate file formats, so that I can ensure data consistency and prevent errors
(2,): As a data analyst, I want to submit files to FABS, so that I can report on funding agency codes
(0,): As a data engineer, I want to load data from FPDS, so that I can update the USASpending database As a DABS user, I want to load data from the database, so that I can access and analyze the information As a data validator, I want to check for missing required elements, so that I can identify and correct data gaps
(3,): As a system user, I want to receive success or error messages, so that I can understand the outcome of my actions
